Key Match Events: Domantas Sabonis recorded a triple-double with 29 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists.
DeMar DeRozan and De'Aaron Fox combined for 51 points, 13 assists, and 5 rebounds.
Anthony Davis scored 31 points, grabbed 9 rebounds, and dished out 2 assists, but had 22 shot attempts.
LeBron James scored 32 points, pulled down 14 rebounds, and dished out 10 assists.
The Lakers emerged with a 131-127 win despite trailing by 7 points in the fourth quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win.
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship.
